page.title: 12Housing,1985,St.Austell.
page.content: 52 years ago St. Austell was mostly fields and cultivated land,with very few buildings.Extensive building has taken place,mainly housing,particularly to the north of the railway line. An increased population has created extra traffic and therefore more polution. Mrs.Harris kept cattle,horses and goats in her fields at Sandy Hill. She has sold the fields and 130 houses are going to be built there. There is a stream running through the field.It is going to be protected for future generations and a conservation park will be constructed around it.The area contains rabbits,voles,hedgehogs, pigeons,slow worms and owls.There are also holly blackthorn and beech trees.
